argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ringcl.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_ringmgp | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mnd ) |
| 5 | 3, 1 | #P_mgpbas | |- B = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 2 | #P_mgpplusg | |- .x. = ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_mndcl | |- ( ( ( mulGrp ` R ) e. Mnd /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. B ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. B ) |
